projects.name: Ecommerce website
projects.description: Developed an e-commerce platform wherein users can buy clothes for children as well as for young and more. It offers dynamic data from MongoDB, responsive design, dynamic pagination based on data, and developer REST APIs for insertion, retrieval, deletion of data, user authentication, individual user data storage, and for other advanced tasks. Applied MERN stack knowledge successfully to create a fully functional MERN stack website.

projects.name: Movie Review System
projects.description: Developed a movie review website where user can see trailer and write review about trailer. Implemented separation of concerns using React (frontend) and Java with Spring Boot (backend). Utilized MongoDB for efficient database management.

experiences.description: Acquired a deep understanding of Java, Oops concept, Spring boot. which are foundational technologies for java development. Designed and implemented a full-stack project using Java Spring Boot as the backend. Honed problem-solving skills through real-world application of knowledge.

Learned Mongo DB, Express JS, React JS , Node JS. Demonstrated proficiency in using version control systems like Git and GitHub for collaborative development. After learning these skills, I collaborated with a team to create a clone of the Programming Pathshala webpage as a project.

full_output.name: VINAY PAL
achievements_and_awards: Solve 250+ problems on Leetcode and GFG platforms.
Golden badge in Java on Hacker Rank
